@graph.name: Potato subzi with Dried Fenugreek and Fennel! - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Potato Subzi with Dried Fenugreek and Fennel. Easy recipe ready in half an hour. Serve this hot with curries or Daal soups, rotis or rice! Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.

itemListElement.name: Potato subzi with Dried Fenugreek and Fennel!

@graph.name: Potato Subzi with Dried Fenugreek and Fennel
@graph.description: Potato Subzi with Dried Fenugreek and Fennel. Easy recipe ready in half an hour. Serve this hot with curries or Daal soups, rotis or rice! Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes ((adjust quantity for the heat you want in the dish))
salt to tate ((1/2 teaspoon or so))

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium pan on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a medium pan on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds and wait till they start to splutter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard seeds and wait till they start to splutter.

recipeInstructions.text: add in the asofetida, cumin, fennel and fenugreek seeds and mix well for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: add in the asofetida, cumin, fennel and fenugreek seeds and mix well for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the red pepper flakes, ginger and garlic and mix well. Cook for a few minutes until garlic starts to turn golden
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the red pepper flakes, ginger and garlic and mix well. Cook for a few minutes until garlic starts to turn golden

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the turmeric powder and potatoes and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the turmeric powder and potatoes and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the dried fenugreek and chopped cilantro and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the dried fenugreek and chopped cilantro and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook on medium low heat. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook on medium low heat. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until potatoes are soft and well cooked from the inside (15 -20 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until potatoes are soft and well cooked from the inside (15 -20 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with curries, rotis, rice!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with curries, rotis, rice!

@graph.keywords: easy indian recipe, indian potato, Indian side dish
